attributes.action: lead Britain out of the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The vast majority of the working population were too young to take part in the 1975 Referendum on whether Britain should remain in the European Economic Community. Accordingly, we demand the right to have a say on whether we remain or leave what is in essence the historical legacy of our forebears and, if overwhelming support exists to leave the EU, we demand the Government call an immediate referendum.
